span.title: Survey - Allows authors to enter rich text content.

div.p: ​​During the transition to the online Alternative Learning Plan due to the COVID-19 schools closure, we have experienced an abundance of success. Still, we recognize there are areas we can continue to develop and improve.

Please take a moment to complete a brief survey that will provide insight into our families’ perspectives on progress toward our Alternative Learning Plan priorities: To maintain relationships, continue to keep students connected to their school and classmates, and provide instruction on our essential course outcomes.
